    The most useful command of the night

    08 Dec 2010

    The most useful command of the night :
    find . -name “settings.py” -exec sed -i .bak -e “s/ / /g” {} \;

    * Note - the spaces after “s/” is actually a tab character. To enter this on a command line type Ctrl-V,
